info.name: Gokulakrishnan
info.title: Software Engineer
info.about: Software engineer with 2+ years of experience in frontend development, specializing in React JS, React Native, JavaScript, and modern UI frameworks. Proficient in building responsive and cross-platform applications, integrating APIs, and delivering intuitive user interfaces. Experienced in agile development environments and effective team collaboration.
info.experience_summary: Gokulakrishnan has over 2 years of experience in frontend and mobile development using React and React Native, having worked on various scalable and cross-platform projects at doodleblue Innovations.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Working on cross-platform applications using React JS and React Native.
Implemented UI components using SCSS, Bootstrap, Tailwind CSS, etc.
Collaborated with the team to build scalable features and optimize performance.

experience.title: React Developer | React-Native (Intern)
description: Contributed to building responsive web UIs using React and CSS.
Collaborated on frontend enhancements and bug fixing.
Worked with JavaScript, Bootstrap, and various UI libraries.

info.skills: Gokulakrishnan is skilled in a wide range of technologies including frontend, backend, and developer tools.

skills_summary.languages: He is proficient in HTML, CSS, SCSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
skills_summary.frontend: He works with React, React Native, and Next.js to build responsive and cross-platform UIs.
skills_summary.ui_libraries: He uses Tailwind CSS, Bootstrap, Material UI, Redux, React Query, Axios, and Recharts for modern user interfaces.
skills_summary.backend: He is familiar with backend technologies such as Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB.
skills_summary.tools: He regularly works with Git, GitHub, VS Code, Xcode, Android Studio, Postman, Firebase, Figma, Vercel, NPM, and Vite.
skills_summary.operating_systems: He is comfortable working on both Windows and macOS.
